column1: An analysis of tourist arrivals by airline reveals that Sri Lankan Airlines holds the largest
share  with  25.1%  of  the  total.  Qatar  Airways  follows  with  10.9%,  and  Emirates  with
9.0%. IndiGo and Etihad contribute 8.5% and 5.4% respectively. This data highlights
the importance of Sri Lankan Airlines, but also emphasizes the significant contribution
of Middle Eastern and South Asian carriers in connecting Sri Lanka to a global market.
